text: What did you want to know about UC?

The University of Cincinnati Bearcats are a Division I NCAA football team. The Bearcats currently play in the Big 12 conference.

For more info, see: https://gobearcats.com/sports/football
UC's CEAS offers a Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science. For more information, look here: https://ceas.uc.edu/academics/departments/computer-science.html

For the 2022-2023 tuition cohort, UC's tuition rates per semester are as follows:
In-state: $6,588.00
Out-of-state: $14,255.00

For more info see: https://www.uc.edu/about/bursar/tuition-fees.html
For the 2022-2023 cohort, housing costs start at $3,821 per semester. More information can be found here: https://www.uc.edu/campus-life/housing/apply/rates/2022-23-cohort.html

I don't quite understand your question. I know about the following topics:
- Football team
- Computer Science
- Tuition Prices
- On-Campus Housing Prices
